condition_submit_for_agreement: Or, finish your priorities and submit for agreement
mid_year_review_title: What have you contributed this half year and how have you gone about it?
mid_year_review_help_text: Use this to capture the outcome of the conversation you’ve had with your line manager. Remember to focus as much on your how as your what.
end_year_review_title: What have you contributed this year and how have you gone about it?
mid_year_review_widget_title: Complete this once you’ve had your mid-year conversation with your line manager.
end_year_review_widget_title: Complete this once you’ve had your year-end conversation with your line manager.
myr_review_sent_to_manager: Your comments have been submitted to your Line Manager
approve_or_decline_review: Agree, complete or request amend colleague’s priorities or reviews
time_to_approve_or_decline: It's time to review your colleague's priorities and / or reviews
approve_or_decline: Agree or request to amend the
decline_review_agreement: Done, you've requested the form to be amended as it doesn't reflect the conversation you had with your colleague. Please pick up with them directly to discuss more.
you_have_rejected: You've requested the form to be amended as it doesn't reflect the conversation you had with your colleague. Please pick up with them directly to discuss more.
approve_objectives_or_reviews: Are you sure you want to agree priorities or reviews?
you_have_bulk_approved: You have approved your colleague's priorities, review forms.
you_have_approved_objective: You have agreed your colleague objective.
you_have_approved_quarter: You have agreed your colleague priority.
you_have_approved_myr: You have agreed your colleague mid-year review.
you_have_approved_eyr: You have agreed your colleague year-end review.
you_have_completed: You have agreed the completion of your colleague's priority!
recognition_is_important_as_all_other_fe: Recognition is just as important as all other feedback. We need to remember to celebrate our successes, share praise or say "thank you" to our colleagues when things have gone well. You can share recognition with your colleagues during face to face conversations or through the <0>Meaningful Moments Hub</0>
when_requesting_feedback_choose_one_area: When requesting feedback, choose what area(s) you’d like feedback on. This could be any part of your role: ‘what’ you do or ‘how’ you do it.
performance_reviews_description: Find out more about having great performance discussions
strategic_objectives_description: Find out more about creating effective quarterly priorities and having meaningful check-ins
internal_careers_site_description: Explore internal vacancies and register for job alerts
be_well_hub_description: Explore key resources and support that help you and the people you care about Be Well.
learning_curriculum_description: Explore learning available to support you in your role
everyday_feedback_lets_you_share: Everyday feedback lets you share your feedback with your colleagues across any work level and function in real time. This type of feedback lets a colleague know what they're doing great at, the opportunities they have to be even better and how to make improvements continuously, meaning they can take the feedback onboard and start to make changes straight away. It can and should relate to any part of their full contribution: someone's personal development, their impact on others, their day job or quarterly priorities. Colleagues have the option to request Everyday feedback, focusing on any area of interest.
hint_review_7: Make sure what you write properly captures the conversation you and your manager had – remember they will be sent this for their agreement.
